name: Attuned_Essence_Transfer_D
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.
power_short_helps: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost, and Increases Attack Rate
